title.narrative: START Aniticpation Altert: Displacement Due to Demolitions

description.narrative: The overall objective of the intervention is to provide alternative housing for the communities affected by the planned demolition of buildings without permits by the Lebanese government. Assistance will have an instant impact on communities in the short term as it will decrease the chances that they become further displaced and increase risks associated with this as it would allow affected households to directly relocate to newly distributed tents.The intervention is expected to have a positive impact on children by increasing their awareness of potential risks and knowledge of where to go for help through community-based Child Protection activities. Vulnerable children identified to receive focused/non-specialised Child Protection support will benefit directly from tailored emotional interventions to minimise stress resulting from displacement and improve their psychosocial wellbeing. Parents and caregivers will benefit from having a safe space where they can exchange and share posi

mailing-address.narrative: 1 Saint Johns Lane, London EC1M 4AR, United Kingdom
